comments.author: The Crone
comments.content:
There are many people in this country who are doing everything they can to save our lives. There are many more people doing everything they can to make sure we have what we need to stay healthy and comfortable. There are millions of Americans that get it and are limiting their


public exposure to protect themselves and their families and also to hold back the tide of sickness and death that is hunting us. There are
government employees, advisers, military, and many others who we will never know about who are doing everything possible to support the
people who are doing the front-line fighting. Thank you does not even begin to express the overwhelming appreciation we have for all of
their sacrifices. God bless all Americans and the rest of the world who are holding onto hope with every fingernail. 
I was reading the local news and came across a video story from a local TV station (NE PA). During the video, a doctor was explaining how the numbers of patients were being counted. If people arrive at the hospital with all of the symptoms of CV19 but are not seriously compromised, they are sent home and told to come back only if they become unmanageable at home. They ARE NOT being actually tested or counted. If somebody is admitted into the hospital and their primary residential address is a state other than PA - they are being counted in the numbers of
that state. This means that there are people out there who are sick and not being tested, so, not confirmation and people confirmed but
not included in the PA state numbers. The other troubling information was that the test results are taking a week to come back.
Specifically, he mentioned that there was a person in the ICU for the past week and their test results still have not been received or confirmed. So, now I have real information that we actually have no idea how many people are actually infected - even with additional testing - and the numbers are not being reported in a way that gives accurate information. To make this even more distressing, the county that this is happening in is a less populated area than most other counties and our percentage to population is at any given moment in first place with the highest percentage using the inaccurate numbers. So, you have a highly infected area, with little or no extra ability to handle the situation being under-reported. Only yesterday have there been arrangements made to bring the Army Corp. into the mix to increase bed count. This does not increase the number of medical staffing. I'm not saying all of this to look for sympathy. I am putting it out there so that you REALLY know how bad things are out there. I haven't left the house in over two weeks and don't plan on going out any time soon. Good luck to us all. Stay as safe as you are
able.

comments.author: Christopher Pearson
comments.content:
Daily [HCV] stats: (Projected Turning Point)
Reported Confirmed Cases / Deaths / Recovered
< [D] (Dec - > dr) > [I] (Inc + < dr) (dr = % death rate)
2003290800 = 6.84% (US % of WW deaths) [mean]
[WW] = Reported 684652/32113/145696 (dr < 4.69%)
[US] = Reported 124763/2191/2612 (dr < 1.76%)
2003300800 = 7.33% (US % of WW deaths) [I > .49%]
[WW] = Reported 741030/35097/156838 (dr < 4.74%)
[US] = Reported 143527/2572/4865 (dr < 1.79%)
2003310800 = 8.38% (US % of WW deaths) [I> 1.05%)
[WW] = Reported 801400/38743/172657 (dr < 4.83%)
[US] = Reported 164610/3170/5945 (dr < 1.93%)
Note: China's ('epicenter' of [HCV-P]) reported stats not reliable but included as base reference point in [WW] stats. Stats don't account for those who are infected but are not yet tested or confirmed because they're asymptomatic or have not otherwise presented or reported their symptoms. Percentage increases are in no small part attributable to developing statistical data collection procedures. Also there's no distinction of the actual cause of death with those who had critical preexisting medical conditions. In actuality this heavily promoted 'Plandemic' is intrinsically no more or less consequential than a common [FLU] - but it's getting exponential [MSM] 'mockingbird' promotion. The available statistical data correlated w/ forensic facts clearly demonstrates [HCV] to be a premeditated Globalist [DS] Operation (a 'Plandemic') of  'Collateral Expedience'.

In October 2009, after more than 1,000 people in the United States had died of swine flu, also known as H1N1, Obama declared a national emergency. From April 12, 2009, to April 10, 2010, in the United States, there were 60.8 million cases of swine flu, 274,304 hospitalizations and 12,469 deaths, now updated to over 17,000 deaths in the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) In October 2009, after more than 1,000 people in the United States had died of swine flu, also known as H1N1, Obama declared a national emergency.

comments.author: perinnial
comments.content: Hi guys, just wanted to remind you that this isn’t the worlds first pandemic, it’s just one of the most severe modern ones in the 21st century. In 1918, the flu was a pandemic that affected at least 500 million and killed nearly 50 million. Now it is an endemic virus. Shutting society down is something that we have learned can help reduce spread, we’re using what we have to do what we can. But we made it through the flu, we‘ll make it through this.
